meanings.sent1: The telae in the brain help send messages.
meanings.sent2: The spider spun a telae to catch insects.
meanings.sent3: The telae in the body are like tiny messengers.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts formed a telae connecting different ideas.
meanings.sent5: The telae of nerves buzzed with electricity.

meanings.sent1: The telae of the spider was intricate and delicate.
meanings.sent2: She sewed a beautiful telae for the dress.
meanings.sent3: The telae of the hammock swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The telae of lies woven around him started to unravel.
meanings.sent5: The telae of the net caught the fish effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: The telae of skin protects our body.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the telae under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The telae of paper crumpled easily in his hands.
meanings.sent4: The telae of clouds covered the sky like a blanket.
meanings.sent5: The telae of muscle flexed with strength.
